com.advenio.medere.dao.nativeSQL.SQLQuer.query: Select s.name as name , s.description as description , u.name as sectormanagermame , (select (case when count (t.task) = 0 then 0 else count (t.task) end) as qtypendingtasksassigned from task t where t.sector = s.sector and t.state = 2) as qtypendingtasksassigned , (select (case when count (u._user) = 0 then 0 else count (u._user) end) as qtyemployeers from _user u where u.sector = s.sector) as qtyusers from Sector s JOIN _user u on u._user = s.sectormanager
